lines.text: I beg pardon, sir. Do you ever dream of girls?

[laughs]
No, when I dream, it's usually about horses.
There's a vast difference, sir, between the art of making money and the art of making... a lady.
Is this your crowd? I'd like to dance.
lines.character: Kitty - Aero Girl With Long Earrings

lines.text: Yes, darling, but they're pretty old.

lines.character: Kitty - Aero Girl With Long Earrings

lines.text: Come this way, my man. I'll show you what's what.

[believing that he had witnessed Larry and Roger in a romantic clinch]
I ain't your man, and I what's what!
